title: 104 72 12 "Zero""Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line!"Transliteration: "Rufi vs Bibi! Nakama ni kakeru namida no chikai" (Japanese:ルフィVSビビ!仲間に賭ける涙の誓い) Ken Koyama Junki Takegami March 10, 2002(2002-03-10)[186] June 17, 2006[187][188]
